testCase.requirementText: Attribute used with the value “simple”. Value list is maintained by the xlink standard
testCase.description: The @xlink:type is optional in METS schema but mandatory according to CSIP23. The METS schema only allows one value in this attribute: "simple" with lowercase. Uppercase and no value gives validation error

error.message: In METS.XML the dmdSec/mdRef-element MUST have the attribute: @xlink:type and its value must be "simple"

package.name: IP_18000_CSIP23_1
package.description: The METS.XML does not have the @xlink:type attribute.
